1: <pb/><t>Aretak in</t> <t>c'o chupam ri c'axc'ol,</t> <t>quinsiq'uij ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ri are' cutzelej c'ut u wäch nu tzij.</t>
2: <t>Ajawaxel,</t> <t>chinesaj la chquiwäch ri banal tak tzij,</t> <t>xukuje' chuwäch ri ak'aj ri cuban nimal.</t>
3: <pb/><t>¿Jas ta chic ri cacuin ri ak'aj</t> <t>ri banal nimal cuc'amo?</t>
4: <t>¡T'ist'ic qui wi' tak ch'ab</t> <t>quech ajch'ojab!</t> <t>¡E rachak k'ak' ri quekakatic</t> <t>e re ri che' ri retam u bi'!</t>
5: <pb/><t>¡Tok'ob nu wäch</t> <t>in ri xa wokxanim wib pa Mesec,</t> <t>ri in jekel</t> <t>chquixo'l tak ri lic'om re Sedar!</t>
6: <t>Sibalaj in beytajinak chquixo'l</t> <t>ri cäquetzelaj u wäch ri jamaril;</t>
7: <t>¡aretak quintzijoj jamaril,</t> <t>ri e are' cäquitzijoj ch'o'j!</t>
